item.title: Notes on Immanuel Kant's Critique of Pure Reason: I. Transcendental Doctrine of Elements: Second Part. Transcendental Logic: Introduction
item.description: During the months of December 2007 and January 2008, I'll be reading the Critique of Pure Reason, with Gavin Schmitt, and taking notes, which I'll be posting here. These are the notes to the Introduction of the Second Part (the Transcendental Logic) of the Transcendental Doctrine of Elements. [slnet0514:06d9307d-16b9-4f27-a356-78d2bdef0843]

item.title: Notes on Immanuel Kant's Critique of Pure Reason: I. Transcendental Doctrine of Elements: First Part. Transcendental Aesthetic: General Observations and Conclusion
item.description: During the months of December 2007 and January 2008, I'll be reading the Critique of Pure Reason, with Gavin Schmitt, and taking notes, which I'll be posting here. These are the notes to the General Observations on, and the Conclusion of the, Transcendental Aesthetic, of the First Part (the Transcendental Aesthetic) of the Transcendental Doctrine of Elements. [slnet0514:78ce7f8d-7bf1-4257-83ca-86f5c4af2ea7]

item.title: Notes on Immanuel Kant's Critique of Pure Reason: I. Transcendental Doctrine of Elements: First Part. Transcendental Aesthetic: Space and Time
item.description: During the month of December 2007, I'll be reading the Critique of Pure Reason, with Gavin Schmitt, and taking notes, which I'll be posting here. These are the notes to Sections I and II, on Space and Time, of the First Part (the Transcendental Aesthetic) of the Transcendental Doctrine of Elements. [slnet0514:ce337a28-8dfd-4d2b-a7b5-8c632ad0c11d]

item.description: During the month of December 2007, I'll be reading the Critique of Pure Reason, with Gavin Schmitt, and taking notes, which I'll be posting here. item.title: Notes on Immanuel Kant's Critique of Pure Reason: Introduction
item.description: During the month of December 2007, I'll be reading the Critique of Pure Reason, with Gavin Schmitt, and taking notes, which I'll be posting here. These are the notes to the author's Introduction. [slnet0514:50762fdb-0765-4a9c-bdc9-2390d1eb7ec1]

item.title: Notes on Immanuel Kant's Critique of Pure Reason: Preface to Second Edition
item.description: During the month of December 2007, I'll be reading the Critique of Pure Reason, with Gavin Schmitt, and taking notes, which I'll be posting here. These are the notes to the second edition's Preface. [slnet0514:26de9a81-2e72-4559-a7a8-8a89a1b2965c]

item.description: During the month of December 2007, I'll be reading the Critique of Pure Reason, with Gavin Schmitt, and taking notes, which I'll be posting here. These are the notes to the first edition's Preface. [slnet0514:ec9e6eff-5488-4680-990f-ec21146bf981]

item.title: Perceptions of Immanuel Kant Before a Reading of the Critique of Pure Reason
item.description: Thoughts on Immanuel Kant, before I've ever really read one of his major works.
